verses.text: \w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: and all that is \w within|strong="H7130"\w* me, \add bless\add* his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.
\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* not all his \w benefits|strong="H1576"\w*:
Who \w forgiveth|strong="H5545"\w* all thine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*; who \w healeth|strong="H7495"\w* all thy \w diseases|strong="H8463"\w*;

Who \w redeemeth|strong="H1350"\w* thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w* from \w destruction|strong="H7845"\w*; who \w crowneth|strong="H5849"\w* thee with \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* and tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*;

Who \w satisfieth|strong="H7646"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H5716"\w* with \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add things; so that\add* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* is \w renewed|strong="H2318"\w* like the \w eagle’s|strong="H5404"\w*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w executeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* for all that are \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w*.
He made \w known|strong="H3045"\w* his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, his \w acts|strong="H5949"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w* and \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, \w slow|strong="H0750"\w* to \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w plenteous|strong="H7227"\w* in \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.\f + \fr 103.8 \ft plenteous…: Heb. great in mercy\f*
He will not \w always|strong="H5331"\w* \w chide|strong="H7378"\w*: neither will he \w keep|strong="H5201"\w* \add his anger\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
He hath not \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* with us after our \w sins|strong="H2399"\w*; nor \w rewarded|strong="H1580"\w* us according to our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

For as the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* is high \w above|strong="H1361"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \add so\add* \w great|strong="H1396"\w* is his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* toward them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him.\f + \fr 103.11 \ft as…: Heb. according to the height of the heaven\f*

As far \w as|strong="H7368"\w* the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* is from the \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, \add so\add* far hath he \w removed|strong="H7368"\w* our \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* from us.

Like as a \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w pitieth|strong="H7355"\w* \add his\add* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \add so\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w pitieth|strong="H7355"\w* them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him.
For he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* our \w frame|strong="H3336"\w*; he \w remembereth|strong="H2142"\w* that we \add are\add* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

\add As for\add* \w man|strong="H0582"\w*, his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add are\add* as \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*: as a \w flower|strong="H6731"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, so he \w flourisheth|strong="H6692"\w*.

For the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* passeth \w over|strong="H5674"\w* it, and it is gone; and the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* thereof shall \w know|strong="H5234"\w* it no more.\f + \fr 103.16 \ft it is…: Heb. it is not\f*

But the \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* from \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* upon them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him, and his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* unto \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*;
To such as \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and to those that \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H6490"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* in the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; and his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* \w ruleth|strong="H4910"\w* over all.

\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye his \w angels|strong="H4397"\w*, that \w excel|strong="H1368"\w* in \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w*, \w hearkening|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 103.20 \ft that excel…: Heb. mighty in strength\f*

\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all \add ye\add* his \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \add ye\add* \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* of his, that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* his \w pleasure|strong="H7522"\w*.

\w Bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all his \w works|strong="H4639"\w* in all \w places|strong="H4725"\w* of his \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*: \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
